member.name: P:napravo_schedule.Properties.Resources.crap
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to [ { "idClass": 4, "subjectTitle": "Математика", "teacherName": "Василий Василиевич Васильков", "groupTitle": "Вп-31", "time": 540, "dayOfWeek": 1 }, { "idClass": 5, "subjectTitle": "Физика", "teacherName": "Василий Василиевич Васильков", "groupTitle": "Вп-31", "time": 640, "dayOfWeek": 1 }, { "idClass": 6, "subjectTitle": "Unity", "teacherName": "Василий Василиевич Васильков", "groupTitle": "Вп-31", "time": 7 [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:napravo_schedule.Properties.Resources.notif
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to [ { "idNotification": 2, "idStudent": 1, "header": "Результаты экзамена", "message": "У вас 2", "moment": "2023-06-15T00:00:00", "isChecked": true }, { "idNotification": 4, "idStudent": 1, "header": "Средний балл по вашей группе ниже 2.78", "message": "Вы близки к своему отчислению", "moment": "2023-06-16T00:00:00", "isChecked": false } ].
